cab.content: .S E C R E Te"OPERATIONS .Prom:- General Plumer^ Italy. To:- C.I.G.S*, War Office^Des* 8*12.17.Re3. 10.5 a,m. 9.12.17.0. 105 December Oth,The situation is unchanged to-day * There has been very little activity during last 24 hours*Fayolle and I had a conference this morning with Diaz and arranged a joint plan of action in the event of there being further retirements by the Italians in the vicinity of the Asiago Plateauc We are trying to limit any such retire-ments to localities and to prevent their becoming general0
